name: Five Nights at Treasure Island
summary:
"If you really believe in something, it can be yours."

Your name is Jake Smith. You are a university student who joined the SSA through an educational program, mainly for your lack of money. The SSA has given you a rather strange assignment: look over the notorious abandoned Disney resort "Treasure Island" to collect data. Little do you know about the dark secrets and horrors hidden on the island itself.
You are not alone...
